title: Fitbit Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications will only be available in the US, and this is what they look like
content:
After being granted clearance earlier this month, and starting the rollout yesterday, Fitbit is confirming a few more details regarding Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications, including where and how they work.

moreâ€¦

The post Fitbit Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications will only be available in the US, and this is what they look like appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: For the time being, Fitbit has confirmed that its new Irregular Heart Rhythm Notifications feature is only available in the US.
